BatchApplyAccountBaselines.document: This API is used to apply baselines to existing accounts in batches.
BatchApplyAccountBaselines.name: Applies baselines to existing accounts in batches

GetAccountFactoryBaseline.document: This API is used to retrieve user baseline configuration data.
GetAccountFactoryBaseline.name: Retrieve user baseline configuration data

ListAccountFactoryBaselineItems.document: This API is used to obtain account factory system baseline items.
ListAccountFactoryBaselineItems.name: Obtain an account factory system baseline item

ListDeployStepTasks.document: This API is used to retrieve the application history of a certain baseline item.
ListDeployStepTasks.name: Retrieve a certain baseline item history application information

UpdateAccountFactoryBaseline.document: This API is used to update the current baseline item configuration of a user. The baseline configuration will be overwritten with the current configuration. When adding new baseline items, the newly-added baseline configuration needs to be added to the existing configuration. When deleting baseline items, the deleted baseline configuration needs to be removed from the existing configuration, then save the latest baseline configuration.
UpdateAccountFactoryBaseline.name: Update user baseline item configuration

members.document: Specifies the unique identifier for account factory baseline item, can only contain english letters, digits, and @, ,._[]-:()()[]+=., with a length of 2-128 characters.
members.name: Identifier

members.document: Baseline item name. specifies a unique name for the feature item. supports a combination of english letters, numbers, chinese characters, and symbols @, &, _, [, ], -. valid values: 1-25 chinese or english characters.
members.name: Name

members.document: Baseline item english name. specifies a unique name for the baseline item. supports a combination of english letters, digits, spaces, and symbols @, &, _, [], -. valid values: 1-64 english characters.
members.name: NameEn

members.document: Baseline item weight. the smaller the value, the higher the weight. value range equal to or greater than 0.
members.name: Weight

members.document: Specifies whether the baseline item is required (1: required; 0: optional).
members.name: Required

members.document: Baseline item dependency. value range of N depends on the count of other baseline items it relies on.
members.name: DependsOn

members.document: Baseline description, with a length of 2 to 256 english or chinese characters. it is empty by default.
members.example: 为新账号设置联系人，以配置消息通知。
members.name: Description

members.document: Baseline item english description, with a length of 2 to 1024 english characters. it is empty by default.
members.example: Add contacts for new accounts to receive notifications.
members.name: DescriptionEn

members.document: Baseline classification. length: 2-32 english or chinese characters. values cannot be empty.
members.name: Classify

members.document: Baseline english classification, with a length of 2-64 english characters. cannot be empty.
members.name: ClassifyEn

members.document: Specifies the unique identifier for account factory baseline item, can only contain english letters, digits, and @, ,._[]-:()()[]+=., with a length of 2-128 characters.
members.name: Identifier

members.document: Account factory baseline item configuration. different baseline item configuration parameters.
members.name: Configuration

members.document: Specifies the unique identifier for account factory baseline item, can only contain english letters, digits, and @, ,._[]-:()()[]+=., with a length of 2-128 characters.
members.name: Identifier

members.document: Account factory baseline item configuration. different baseline item configuration parameters.
members.name: Configuration

members.document: Specifies the number of accounts for baseline applications.
members.name: ApplyCount

BaselineStepTaskInfo.document: Baseline item deployment task information list.

members.document: Specifies the unique Id of the task, which can only contain english letters and digits, and is a 16-character random string.
members.name: TaskId

members.document: Specifies the unique identifier for the baseline feature item, can only contain english letters, digits, and @, ,._[]-:()()[]+=., with a length of 2-128 characters.
members.name: Identifier

members.document: Specifies the member account uin of the applied baseline item.
members.name: MemberUin

members.document: Baseline item application status. Running means the baseline item is in application. Success means the baseline item application is successful. Failed means the baseline item application failure. Pending means the baseline item is Pending application. Skipped means the baseline item is Skipped.
members.name: Status

members.document: Error code
members.name: ErrCode

members.document: Error message
members.name: ErrMessage

members.document: Baseline item deployment output.
members.name: Output

members.document: Creation time, represented in ISO8601 standard format as yyyy-MM-dd hh:MM:ss.
members.name: CreateTime

members.document: Specifies the last update time in ISO8601 standard representation with format yyyy-MM-dd hh:MM:ss.
members.name: UpdateTime

members.document: Member account UIN, which is also the UIN of the account to which the baseline is applied.
members.name: MemberUinList

members.document: List of baseline item configuration information.
members.name: BaselineConfigItems

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Dependency type. valid values: LandingZoneSetUp or AccountFactorySetUp. LandingZoneSetUp refers to the dependency of landingZone. AccountFactorySetUp refers to the dependency of account factory.
members.name: Type

members.document: Specifies the unique identifier for the feature item, can only contain english letters, digits, and @, ,._[]-:()()[]+=., with a length of 2-128 characters.
members.name: Identifier

members.document: Specifies the uin of the main account to which the resource belongs.
members.name: OwnerUin

members.document: Specifies the baseline item name, which must be unique and can only contain a combination of english letters, digits, chinese characters, and symbols @, &_[]-, with a length of 1-25 chinese or english characters.
members.name: Name

members.document: List of baseline item configurations.
members.name: BaselineConfigItems

members.document: Creation time, represented in ISO8601 standard format as yyyy-MM-dd hh:MM:ss.
members.name: CreateTime

members.document: Specifies the last update time in ISO8601 standard representation with format yyyy-MM-dd hh:MM:ss.
members.name: UpdateTime

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Maximum number of returned records. value ranges from 0 to 200.
members.name: Limit

members.document: Offset. valid values are equal to or greater than 0.
members.name: Offset

members.document: Account factory baseline list.
members.name: BaselineItems

members.document: Total quantity.
members.name: Total

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Specifies the unique identifier for the feature item, can only contain english letters, digits, and @, ,._[]-:()()[]+=., with a length of 2-128 characters.
members.name: Identifier

members.document: Maximum number of returned records. value ranges from 0 to 200.
members.name: Limit

members.document: Offset. valid values are equal to or greater than 0.
members.name: Offset

members.document: Account factory baseline function application information list.
members.name: BaselineDeployStepTaskList

members.document: Total quantity.
members.name: Total

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Specifies the baseline name, which must be unique and can only contain a combination of english letters, digits, chinese characters, and symbols @, &_[]-, with a length of 1-25 chinese or english characters.
members.name: Name

members.document: Baseline configuration. overwrite update. can be accessed through controlcenter:GetAccountFactoryBaseline to query existing baseline configuration. can be accessed through controlcenter:ListAccountFactoryBaselineItems to query supported baseline list.
members.name: BaselineConfigItems

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
